name: Gob!
description:
(Give it a minute to load, it's 6mb. This is version 1.2, the 7DRL builds are linked below.)

Gob! is a turn-based shoot-em-up, made for the 7 day roguelike challenge: 7DRL 2017. Your quest is to get a high score.

Use W,A,S,D to shoot. Cursor keys to move. Space bar to wait. 1-7 equips / unequips spells to your shots (they activate in the sequence you equip them).

There's sort-of-mouse-controls: click to move to an empty square, or shoot an occupied one. Right click to shoot in a direction. Click on yourself to wait. It didn't like my graphics tablet - watch out for that (or just use keys).

Being made for a game jam, it is what it is. I feel I could do more but I've had other things I want to make.
